solution_line_template: Tommy's area is {tommy_width} blocks wide because {east_blocks} + {west_blocks} = <<{east_blocks}+{west_blocks}={tommy_width}>>{tommy_width}
His area is {tommy_height} blocks tall because {north_blocks} + {south_blocks} = <<{north_blocks}+{south_blocks}={tommy_height}>>{tommy_height}
The total area is {tommy_area} square blocks because {tommy_width} x {tommy_height} = <<{tommy_width}*{tommy_height}={tommy_area}>>{tommy_area}
His friend's area is {times_greater} times bigger because {friend_area} / {tommy_area} = <<{friend_area}/{tommy_area}={times_greater}>>{times_greater}
